text: why backup and restore with AWS a well
architected backup solution leveraging
AWS reduces cost increases data
durability handles massive scale and
does this all securely AWS Storage is
designed to deliver on a customer
promise of eleven nines of data
durability and our infrastructure can
securely replicate data across the globe
to help meet compliance requirements AWS
storage resources automatically scale up
and down to accommodate ever-changing
backup needs this eliminates traditional
resource planning and refresh cycles for
disks tapes and hardware you can also
use other AWS services to build
workflows and analytics around your
backup data for AI and machine learning
our global data center and network
architecture are built for the most
security sensitive organizations in the
world we offer services to manage
account access analyze data for a
regular activity help comply with
industry and government standards and
encrypt data in transit and at rest to
learn more go to AWS backup and restore
